mapper.select: select orderedPostList.* from (select rownum rn, postList.* from (select postNo, cateNo, postTitle, to_char(regDate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as regDate from post where cateNo = #{cateNo} order by postNo desc) postList) orderedPostList where rn>=(#{page}*#{pageView}-#{pageView}+1) and rn<=(#{page}*#{pageView})
select p.postTitle as postTitle, p.postContent as postContent , to_char(p.regDate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as regDate, c.cateName from post p, category c where p.postNo = #{postNo} and p.cateNo = c.cateNo
